about_the_game:
Escape the pit with your plungers!

Swing to freedom as a determined rooster named 'Cluck Norris', using only a pair of plungers to lunge and swing your way upwards. Precision and timing are crucial; one wrong move can send you back to the start, making each leap a test of skill and patience. Can you conquer the pit and reach the top?

Explore diverse biomes with unique challenges!

Journey through a variety of biomes, each presenting distinct obstacles and increasing difficulty. Every environment tests your plunging skills in new ways. Adapt to the changing landscapes and prove your mastery across all terrains.

Create, share, and conquer custom levels! (not included in demo)

Unleash your creativity with the in-game level editor, allowing you to design and share your own challenging stages. Craft unique levels and intricate obstacles, then share them with the community to see who can master your creations. Endless possibilities await as you explore and conquer new user-generated levels.

Join the community!

Subscribe to the Youtube channel for an in-depth look into the game's development with devlogs and other video content. 

Join the Discord if you wanna get an even closer look at the development of the game and provide feedback, bug reports or just simply lurk.

Check social links on the right side of this page!

Escape the pit with your plungers!

Swing to freedom as a determined rooster named 'Cluck Norris', using only a pair of plungers to lunge and swing your way upwards. Precision and timing are crucial; one wrong move can send you back to the start, making each leap a test of skill and patience. Can you conquer the pit and reach the top?

Explore diverse biomes with unique challenges!

name: Chickens Don't Fly

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In this tough-as-nails physics-platformer, swing to freedom as a rooster whose only hope of escaping a harsh pit of hopelessness lies in a pair of plungers and his own strength. Grapple your way to freedom, but be careful—one wrong move can send you back to the start.
